howtoinvestfordummies.model

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • howtoinvestfordummies.model.Portfolio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPortfolio

    public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPortfolio
    Represents implementation for IPortfolio interface. This class provides features related to operations at portfolio level which includes finding cost and value of all the investments in the portfolio, list all the investments and add investment to the portfolio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Portfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Constructor to create the portfolio object.
      Portfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName, java.util.List<IInvestment> investments)
      Constructor to create portfolio object with the name and list of investments of the portfolio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPortfolio addInvestments(IInvestment investment)
      Adds investment object to the existing investments in the portfolio and returns the updated Portfolio object.
      double getCostBasis(java.util.Date date)
      Calculates total cost of the investments in the portfolio up to a specified date.
      java.util.List<IInvestment> getInvestments()
      Returns the new list containing same investments present in this portfolio.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns name of the portfolio.
      double getValue(java.util.Date date)
      Calculates value of all the investments up to the specified date present in this portfolio.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns toString representation of Portfolio object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Portfolio

        public Portfolio(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Constructor to create the portfolio object. It initialises portfolio with the name and an empty investment list.

        portfolioName - name of the portfolio in String.

                 java.util.List<IInvestment> investments)

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns name of the portfolio.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface IPortfolio
        Returns:
        name of the portfolio in String.

      • getValue

        public double getValue(java.util.Date date)
        Calculates value of all the investments up to the specified date present in this portfolio. It first filters out investments based on the date and then sums up the current value of each investments in double and returns the sum in the end.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface IPortfolio
        Parameters:
        date - for which investment value needs to be fetched.
        Returns:
        value of the investment up to 2 digits in double.

      • getCostBasis

        public double getCostBasis(java.util.Date date)
        Calculates total cost of the investments in the portfolio up to a specified date. It first filters out the investments based on the purchase date and then sums up the cost value of each investments and returns that in the end.
        Specified by:
        getCostBasis in interface IPortfolio
        Parameters:
        date - for which investment cost needs to be fetched.
        Returns:
        cost of investment in double.

      • addInvestments

        public IPortfolio addInvestments(IInvestment investment)
        Adds investment object to the existing investments in the portfolio and returns the updated Portfolio object.
        Specified by:
        addInvestments in interface IPortfolio
        Parameters:
        investment - object of type IInvestment that needs to be added.
        Returns:
        portfolio object updated by adding this new investment.

      • getInvestments

        public java.util.List<IInvestment> getInvestments()
        Returns the new list containing same investments present in this portfolio.
        Specified by:
        getInvestments in interface IPortfolio
        Returns:
        list of investments of type IInvestment.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns toString representation of Portfolio object. It first writes the name of the portfolio, and calls toString of respective investments and then appends total investment cost and value at the end.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of the Portfolio object.
